Posts.Content: Nov 3, 2011 10:06PM FAITHINHIM wrote: Hi I am 4 years out and doing great.   It does get so much easier to accept and you do feel like you are part of the human race again.   I know when I was first diagonsed, I felt like the world was moving around me at a fast pace and I was standing still.  Once you get past the point of acceptance and determination to be a survivor...the easier it gets.   God bless!
